alert.note: Alert for McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:08PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern McHenry County through 845 PM CDT... At 808 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walworth, or near Williams Bay, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harvard, Genoa City, Richmond and Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Illinois.
